code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function OwnerLogin(){const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[isAuthenticated,setIsAuthenticated]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(username==='sripriya'&&password==='4453'){setIsAuthenticated(true);}else{alert('Invalid credentials!');}};const goTo=path=>navigate(path);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container mt-4",children:!isAuthenticated?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Owner Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Username",className:"form-control mb-2",onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",className:"form-control mb-2",onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Login"})]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Welcome, ",username,"!"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-grid gap-2 mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-success",onClick:()=>goTo('/admin/add-book'),children:"\u2795 Add Book"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-danger",onClick:()=>goTo('/admin/manage-books'),children:"\uD83D\uDDD1\uFE0F View/Delete Books"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-secondary",onClick:()=>goTo('/'),children:"\uD83D\uDD19 Exit Dashboard"})]})]})});}export default OwnerLogin;
